Hero.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
Hero.subtitle: Building a better future, one line of code at a time.

About.title: About Me
About.paragraph1: Systems Engineer & Full Stack Developer with 2.5+ years of experience designing and implementing scalable software solutions. Skilled in backend (Java, Node.js, Python, DJango PHP), frontend (Vue3, React, TypeScript), and databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB). Proficient in Docker, Git, CI/CD, and Linux.
About.paragraph2: Strong background in software architecture, microservices, and deployment. Bilingual: English & Spanish. Seeking remote opportunities to contribute to innovative and impactful projects.
About.cta_pharagraph: Always open to new projects and opportunities

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.description: A selection of my most destacated projects, from robust APIs to elegant interfaces

items.title: API with Hexagonal Architecture
items.description: A backend template built with NestJS implementing Hexagonal (Ports & Adapters) Architecture, designed for scalability,maintainability, and clean separation of concerns. It includes modular design, dependency injection, testing setup, and ready-to-use configurations for enterprise-grade applications.

items.title: Vue 3 Admin Dashboard Template (Vuetify)
items.description: A modern admin dashboard template built with Vue 3 and Vuetify, featuring reusable UI components, responsive layout, dark mode support, and CRUD-ready modules. Designed as a base for scalable web applications with clean design and user-friendly navigation.

items.title: International Academic Platform, Braings
items.description: Braings is an AI-powered online education academy designed to offer personalized, accessible, and secure learning. Built with modern technologies such as WordPress, Tutor LMS, and Stripe, it combines innovation and reliability to transform the way we learn.

Projects.cta: Are you interested in some of these projects?
Projects.cta_paragraph: You can explore the code or contact me for more details.

items.title: Software Developer

items.description: Developing innovative applications for different government portfolios, implementing new, scalable technologies.

items.title: Backend Developer
items.description: I participated in projects for international companies in the banking sector, implementing scalable and more secure architectures on the backend, as well as effective communication between colleagues from different countries, todeliver a quality product.

items.title: Application Development Trainee
items.description: As a software development intern, collaborating with large teams, I learned backend, frontend, and devops technologies, preparing us for internal company projects and professional skill development, as well as good communication with product owners.

Contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions. Feel free to reach out.
